name: Tower defense (mariavllr)
description:
This project was made for an Artificial Inteligence subject. The idea was to develop a tower defense like Clash Royal in Unity. There are 4 posible cards: Gigant, Archer, Barbarian and Bomb, and the player can choose between 3 each time.

The player plays among an IA player. The game will determinate which cards to use and which strategy is the best looking at the player actions.
